datafield.subfield: 1 map on 22 sheets, key map, booklet ;
52 x 66 cm. or smaller, on 23 sheets 63 x 71 cm. or smaller.

Accompanied by an index map which is also used with the 1:1,000 series, and a booklet entitled 'Index to the Mohammedan Monuments appearing on the special 1:5,000 scale maps of Cairo' published by the American University in Cairo Press, 1980.
Several sheets have monochrome key map on verso.
All sheets are stamped with Clarence Fisher's stamp on verso.

Sheets: I-V-2 Es-Saiyida Zeinab (1916) -- I-V-4 Old Cairo (1917) -- I-VI-1 Citadel (1917) -- I-VI-3 El-Imam Esh-Shafii (1917) -- II-V-2 Shubra (1915) -- II-V-4 Qasr En-Nil (1915) -- II-VI-1 Ez-Zahir (1916) -- II-VI-2 El-Abbasiya (1915) -- II-VI-3 El-Muski (1916) -- II-VI-4 Eastern Cemetery (Tombs of the Khalifs) (1917) -- III-V-2 Ez. Garabedian (1916) -- III-V-4 Rod El-Farag (1916) -- III-VI-1 El-Ismailia Canal (1916) -- III-VI-2 El-Amiriya (1916) -- III-VI-3 Mit Es-Sirig (1916) -- III-VI-4 El-Qubba (1916) -- III-VII-1 Ez-Zeitun (1917) -- III-VII-3 Heliopolis West (1916) -- III-VII-4 Heliopolis East (1916) -- IV-VI-4 Ez El-Aqqad (1917) -- IV-VII-3 El Matariya (1917) -- IV-VIII-4 Kafr El-Gamus (1917) -- Key map (1917).
May require conservation work before use.
Graphic key to Albright-held sheets at:

Sheet sizes: Key map, 61 x 56 cm. Sheets III-V-2, III-VII-4, II-V-4, 62 x 61 cm. Sheets III-VI-1, III-VI-2, III-V-4, II-VI-1, II-VI-4, I-V-2, I-VI-1, I-V-4, I-VI-3, 62 x 62 cm. Sheet III-VI-3, 63 x 60 cm. Sheets IV-VI-4, IV-VII-3, III-VII-1, III-VI-4, III-VII-3, II-V-2, II-VI-2, 63 x 62 cm. Sheet IV-VIII-4, 71 x 63 cm.
